text:
Wingspan Technology, Philadelphia Suburbs (Blue Bell/Whitpain), Full Time

The Wingspan Technology engineering team is responsible for a series of document management products used in several industries, pharma in particular. Some are SaaS and some installed on site. Conseqently, our engineering team has exposure to a wide range of technology; for new projects weâ€™re using Scala, React, Solr, and Postgres.

We're looking hiring junior software engineers - New engineers will likely start out as support engineers and be mentored by the existing team to build skills on various parts of our stack.

www.wingspan.com Email - gsieling@wingspan.com
